title: Looking For Coach for High Gold-Low Diamond Team
body:
Looking for past tournament experience, and availability for weeknights at EST. Add Dotrix or Yimalicious in game.

Requirements:
1. Help update google docs
2. Theorycraft and strategize around our team's strengths and weaknesses
3. Help us plan on what to improve on
4. Help us scout and plan for tournament matches

We will be looking towards tournaments soon, and the coach will be entitled to an equal share of tournament winnings.
